description: This file defines a Flutter widget named TopNavBar that provides the primary navigation bar for a TV-focused application. It includes focus management, navigation logic, and accessibility features, along with internal widgets for tab buttons and icon buttons.

classes.name: TopNavBar
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that renders the primary navigation bar with TV focus behavior.

classes.name: _TopNavBarState
classes.description: State class for TopNavBar, manages focus nodes and builds the navigation UI.

classes.name: _TvTabButton
classes.description: A custom StatefulWidget representing each navigation tab button.

classes.name: _TvTabButtonState
classes.description: State class for _TvTabButton, manages hover/focus states and appearance.

classes.name: _TvIconButton
classes.description: A custom StatefulWidget for the search icon button with focus and hover effects.

classes.name: _TvIconButtonState
classes.description: State class for _TvIconButton, manages interactive visual states.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes all focus nodes to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the navigation bar widget tree with focus handling, navigation actions, and accessibility semantics.
